name: Take (udreif)
description:
Take is a small action game developed for the Quarantine Jam.

You're Ana, a ruthless sellsword hired to find the amulet of Midas, capable of turning anything to gold. Stab the protectors of the amulet to steal their gold, which will make you stronger. Or you can shoot out from your gold reserves to hurt enemies and block incoming projectiles. Your goal is to take a lot of gold, though, so use it sparingly. If you gather enough gold, you may find what you're looking for.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Arrow Keys - Aim spear / shot

Space - Stab with spear

Insert ( next to arrow keys ) - Shoot Gold

Shift - Dash 

E - Take all the gold currently on-screen
